skills.title: HTML
skills.description: HTML (Hypertext Markup Language) is the standard language for creating and structuring web pages.

skills.title: CSS
skills.description: CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is a styling language used to control the visual presentation of HTML elements on web pages.

skills.title: JavaScript
skills.description: JavaScript is a versatile programming language primarily used for adding interactivity and dynamic behavior to web pages.

skills.title: React js
skills.description: React.js is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces, providing a declarative and component-based approach.

skills.title: Material UI
skills.description: Material-UI is a React framework offering a comprehensive set of customizable and pre-designed components.

skills.title: Figma
skills.description: Figma is a cloud-based design and prototyping tool used by designers, developers, etc to create user interfaces.

skills.title: WordPress
skills.description: WordPress allows users to create and manage websites of all kinds, from blogs and portfolios to e-commerce sites.

portfolio.title: Passenger-Counter-App
